name: Color Quest (CheeseballPete)
description:
A short game about changing colors with just the right amount of jank!

Arrow Keys or WASD to move

Click to slash sword

Touch enemy's that match your color to gain a speed boost, but watch out! The colors might switch at any time.

Made for BenBonk game Jam #4

...

I may have taken the 4 color limitation too literally...
